remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表由複合活動管理的子活動集合。Represents the collection of child activities managed by the composite activity. 這個集合可更新。This collection can be updated. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何建立活動，並將活動當做子系加入至複合活動，同時包含為這個型別設定 寬鬆。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permissive for this type. 這個程式碼範例是 ThrowWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜擲回 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擲回範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Throw Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#179)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#179)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何建立活動，並將活動當做子系加入至複合活動，同時包含為這個型別設定 寬鬆。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permissive for this type. 這個程式碼範例是 ThrowWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜擲回 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擲回範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Throw Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放由這個執行個體及其所有子活動使用的 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放這個執行個體的 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources used by this instance and all child activities of this instance; to release only the unmanaged resources of this instance.

summary.span: 呼叫這個執行個體上的 ，並選擇性呼叫這個執行個體其所有子活動上的 。

span.span: Calls on this instance, and optionally calls on all child activities of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在活動的整個存留期中，會建立或處置數個 .NET 物件。Throughout an activity's lifetime, several .NET objects may be created or disposed. 每次從記憶體卸載工作流程執行個體時，會處置對應到工作流程樹狀結構中活動的 .NET 物件 (在每個活動上呼叫的 方法)。Every time a workflow instance is unloaded from memory, the .NET objects corresponding to the activities in the workflow tree are disposed (the method is called on each activity). 當工作流程執行個體載入回記憶體時，會為每個活動建立新的 .NET 物件，其狀態來自對應的卸載。When the workflow instance is loaded back into memory, a new .NET object is created for each activity with the state from the corresponding unload.
